title: Rust.Client.v14.03.2014.And.Server.v1070.Cracked
description:
Greetings to CS.RIN.RU!

Server Files V1070 Source: CS.RIN.RU
Client Files 14-03-2014 Source: Steamrip
Crack Source: CS.RIN.RU

Cracked Serverlists: <a href="
http://bliss161.net/rust/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bliss161.net/rust/</a>

Cracked server:
[#KUG] Public EU 100Mbit PvP/AirDrops/Starter Kit/InstaCraft/NoDurability
net.connect 62.75.145.175:12345

Server Browser:
A Server Browser is included for your convenience. You can use it to search for online servers.

Download and install Visual C++ Redistributable Package (2013):  <a href="
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784</a> (vcredist_x86.exe)

Client HOW-TO:
1. Launch "ChangeNick.exe" to set your nickname.
2. Launch "Rust Client.exe"
3. In Game, push F1 and write on console : net.connect ip_address:port (change ip_address and port to the ip address and port of the server, default port is 28015)
4. Push Enter and play.
Client console commands : http://playrustwiki.com/wiki/Controls_and_Commands#Commands (server commands can be used if you login as administrator : rcon.login "password")

Server HOW-TO:
1. Launch "Run Server.bat"
You can change server configuration on save/cfg/server.cfg
Server console commands : https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Rust	

PC System Requirements

Minimum:
OS: Windows XP
Processor: 2 ghz
Memory: 4 GB RAM
DirectX: Version 9.0
Hard Drive: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
OS: Windows 8.1
Processor: 3 ghz
Memory: 8 GB RAM
DirectX: Version 11
Network: Broadband Internet connection
Hard Drive: 2 GB available space
